title: KA ANYI JEE NA ULO CHUKWU

sections.title: Verse 1
content: Ka anyi jee na ulo Chukwu, dị n'elu etu,
Ị kwaghachi anyi n'ụfọdụ, kpaa anyi n'otito.
Ị zighị anyi n'ogbu mmadu, zaa anyi n'ụzọ dị mma.

sections.title: Chorus
content: Ị bụ nnolite anyi, dị n'etu dị elu,
Anyi aghị akwụ ego, ma ka anyi na-eso ya.
Ụmụ mmadu niile dị n'elu, kabria Chineke.

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Ọ dịghị onye isi na-abịa, ọ bụrụ Jesu bụ Eze,
Onye bụrụ nwata Chineke, ga-enye ya ike dị mma.
Anyi gbaghị akwụ ego, ma ka anyi na-eso ya.
